channel.title: Readability Principles on Gov's Programming Thoughts
channel.description: Recent content in Readability Principles on Gov's Programming Thoughts

item.title: Make your code readable
item.description: Readability is king. As a developer you will spend more time reading and understanding code than you will writing code.

item.title: The Principle of Least Surprise
item.description: The functionality of a system should not be surprising. It should be as mundane as possible.
